CREATE TABLE CUSTOMER
(
  CITY VARCHAR,
  FIRSTNAME VARCHAR,
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  LASTNAME VARCHAR,
  STREET VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE INVOICE
(
  CUSTOMERID INTEGER,
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  TOTAL FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ITEM
(
  COST FLOAT,
  INVOICEID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  ITEM INTEGER NOT NULL,
  PRODUCTID INTEGER,
  QUANTITY INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE PRODUCT
(
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  NAME VARCHAR,
  PRICE FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SUPPLIER
(
  SUPPLIER_ID INTEGER,
  SUPPLIER_NAME VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE ITEM
(
  COST FLOAT,
  INVOICEID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  ITEM INTEGER NOT NULL,
  PRODUCTID INTEGER,
  QUANTITY INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE PRODUCT2
(
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  NAME VARCHAR,
  PRICE FLOAT
);
